img_above_text:
At lower health, it may also curl into a ball but fly up into the air to slam down while still curled up. Be wary when trying to counter this move, as it will start to squirm around before unraveling into a quick two-hit claw swipe as it reorients itself.
The one last trick it has up its sleeve will occur after losing half its health. When it starts to emit a large screeching roar, break off your attack and start running in the opposite direction.
img_below_text:
Dozens of smaller centipedes will roll over the nearby ledge and into the arena to chase you on multiple fronts, and explode on impact.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 44.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a9/Wukong_MiddleHollow_44.jpg)

The one last trick it has up its sleeve will occur after losing half its health. When it starts to emit a large screeching roar, break off your attack and start running in the opposite direction."
        - Following Text: "Dozens of smaller centipedes will roll over the nearby ledge and into the arena to chase you on multiple fronts, and explode on impact.

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a tense boss battle scene from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. The player character faces off against a large, menacing centipede-like creature named "Centipede Guai" in a dark, web-filled cavern littered with bones and skulls. The health bar at the bottom indicates the ongoing fight, while the preceding and following text suggests the creature has dangerous attack patterns, including explosive reinforcements from smaller centipedes after its health drops below half.
